1.0.0.0.name: connect20/Payin7_Payments
1.0.0.0.description:
Payin7 offers the clients the opportunity of choosing between two products: Pay in 7 days or Finance Payment (http://www.payin7.com)

----

Payin7 ofrece a los clientes la oportunidad de elegir entre dos productos: Pago en 7 días o Pago financiado

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
